verses:
Hail, holy Queen enthroned above, O Maria.
Hail, Queen of mercy and of love, O Maria.
Triumph, all ye cherubim; Sing with us, ye seraphim.
Heaven  and earth resound the hymn: Salve, salve, 
salve,
Regina!

The cause of joy to us below, O Maria.
The spring through which all graces flow, O Maria.
Angels, all your praises bring; Earth and heaven, with us sing
All creation echoing: Salve, salve, 
salve, Regina!

O gentle, loving, holy one, O Maria.
The God of light became your Son, O Maria.
Triumph, all ye cherubim, Sing with us, ye seraphim.
Heaven and earth resound the hymn: Salve, salve, 
salve,
Regina!
